attributes.action: Ensure British subjects or those UK domiciled with offshore accounts are taxed
attributes.background: Most people pay tax as they earn and this Country rightly relies on its citizens paying the tax they owe.  Those who can afford to try and avoid this obligation  by using offshore accounts should be made to pay their taxes and keep their obligation to this Country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament.

You might be interested in signing the following petition on closing tax loopholes following the "Panama papers" leak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126525

Or you could start a new petition calling for a specific action from the Government or Parliament.
